subject: Home & DIY
title: Digital Twins of Your Home
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Digital Twins of Your Home.

hook.text: A digital twin mirrors your physical home virtually. Change the model and the house respondsâ€”and vice versa.

buildup.text: Sensors stream temperature, humidity, energy, and occupancy into a 3D model mirroring your home's live state.

discovery.text: Simulate before building: 'What if I add solar panels? Insulate the attic?' The twin predicts the impact.

twist.text: Digital twins exist for skyscrapers and factories. Home-scale versions emerge as sensor costs drop below $5 each.

climax.text: Insurers and utilities want your home's digital twin. It could predict failuresâ€”or surveil your daily habits.

punchline.text: Two homes: one you live in, one that thinks for you.

quiz.question: What can a digital twin of your home help you simulate?
options: The impact of changes like adding solar panels or insulation
The resale value of your home in different markets
How your home would withstand natural disasters
